events.title: The Broken Floor
events.description: The stone groans beneath heavy boots. A jagged crack races across the tiles before anyone can react. The floor gives way. A scream echoes from the dark below, followed by a sickening thud.

choices.label: Use rope for a risky rescue
choices.description: Tie a rope and descend quickly, hoping the anchor holds. Fear gnaws at everyone.

choices.label: Leave them behind
choices.description: The descent is too dangerous. You turn away, leaving their cries behind.

choices.label: Take time to build a safe rescue
choices.description: Rig a harness and brace the rope with scavenged metal. It costs time, but it might save them.

choices.label: End their suffering
choices.description: A hard decision: silence the pain from above. The echo of the blow lingers.

events.title: Overflow Ward
events.description: A row of comatose patients lies before you, hooked to failing life support machines. Sparks fly from damaged circuits. The weak beeping of alarms echoes in the dim light. Their faces are gaunt, unmoving.

choices.label: Shut down life support
choices.description: End it quickly and quietly. Salvage what parts remain useful.

choices.label: Try to stabilize the machines
choices.description: Spend resources attempting to repair the systems. Maybe one can be saved.

choices.label: Leave them as they are
choices.description: Do nothing. Walk away. Let fate decide.

events.title: Riot Recording
events.description: In a dusty archive room, an old tape recorder sits on a table. The label reads 'INCIDENT REPORT - WARD RIOT'. You press play. Elias's voice crackles through the speakers, ordering beatings and lethal force. Screams follow. The recording is damning.

choices.label: Deny its authenticity
choices.description: Elias claims the recording is altered or taken out of context. It must be a fabrication.

choices.label: Admit responsibility
choices.description: Elias acknowledges what he did. The weight of it crushes down on him.

choices.label: Justify the actions
choices.description: It was necessary. Chaos would have spread. Hard choices had to be made.

events.title: The Confessional Chair
events.description: A therapy room preserved in eerie silence. The chair in the center is surrounded by recording equipment. Dusty tapes line the shelves—sessions Anya conducted, confidences she was supposed to keep. She recognizes her own handwriting on the labels, marking which patients were flagged for 'special attention'.

choices.label: Listen to the tapes and confess
choices.description: Face what was done. Hear the voices of those she betrayed.

choices.label: Minimize and justify
choices.description: She had no choice. It was procedure. She was following orders.

choices.label: Refuse to engage
choices.description: Leave the room. Don't listen. Some things are better left buried.

events.title: Whispering Tunnel
events.description: Subject 13 stops suddenly, head tilted as if listening. 'Do you hear that?' they whisper. A faint voice echoes from a side passage, speaking in fragments: 'Come... see... what you were...' The tunnel seems to pulse with unnatural light.

choices.label: Follow the voice
choices.description: Trust 13's instincts and investigate the passage.

choices.label: Ignore it and move on
choices.description: It's just another hallucination. Keep to the main path.

events.title: Medical Supply Cache
events.description: Behind a collapsed shelving unit, you discover an intact medical supply cache. Bandages, antiseptics, and even some emergency rations are sealed in waterproof containers.

choices.label: Take the supplies
choices.description: Carefully gather everything useful.

choices.label: Leave them for others
choices.description: Someone else might need these more.

events.title: A Dying Patient
events.description: A patient lies against the wall, breathing shallow and labored. They look up at you with recognition in their eyes. 'Please...' they rasp, 'end it... or stay...' Their hand reaches out weakly.

choices.label: Stay and comfort them
choices.description: Hold their hand as they pass. It takes time.

choices.label: End their suffering quickly
choices.description: A swift end is kinder than prolonged agony.

choices.label: Leave them alone
choices.description: You can't help. Keep moving.

events.title: The Mirror Room
events.description: A corridor lined with mirrors on both sides. As you walk, the reflections begin to change. They show versions of yourselves: bloodied, guilty, triumphant, broken. The images shift faster, more disturbing.

choices.label: Stop and confront the reflections
choices.description: Face what you see. Accept it.

choices.label: Smash the mirrors
choices.description: Destroy the lies. Break the glass.

choices.label: Run through quickly
choices.description: Don't look. Just get through.

events.title: A Former Colleague
events.description: You encounter someone from before—a colleague, twisted by the Engine. They recognize you, speaking in broken sentences about 'the old days' and 'what you all did'. Their eyes burn with accusation and madness.

choices.label: Try to talk to them
choices.description: Attempt to reason or apologize.

choices.label: They're too far gone - defend yourself
choices.description: This isn't a person anymore. It's a threat.

choices.label: Flee
choices.description: Run. Don't engage.

events.title: Origin Fragment
events.description: A file folder labeled 'SUBJECT 13 - INTAKE'. Inside are contradictory records: criminal charges, political dissent, voluntary participation. None of it matches. Subject 13 stares at the pages, trying to piece together who they were.

choices.label: Accept that the truth is unknowable
choices.description: Let go of the need to know. Be who you are now.

choices.label: Search for more clues
choices.description: The truth must be somewhere. Keep looking.

choices.label: Choose a version to believe
choices.description: Pick one of the stories. Make it real through belief.

events.title: Experimental Chamber
events.description: A sealed chamber with viewing glass. Inside, surgical equipment and restraints. Miriam recognizes it—she used this room. Records on the desk detail procedures she performed. The patients never consented. Most didn't survive.

choices.label: Destroy the records
choices.description: Burn it all. No one needs to know.

choices.label: Keep the records as evidence
choices.description: The truth deserves to be known, even if it condemns you.

choices.label: Leave without looking further
choices.description: Close the door. Move on.

events.title: Remnants of Prayer
events.description: A small chapel area, desecrated and abandoned. Anya's prayer books lie torn on the floor. On the wall, someone has written 'WHERE WAS GOD?' in dried blood. The question hangs heavy in the stale air.

choices.label: Pray anyway
choices.description: Faith doesn't require answers. Offer a prayer for the lost.

choices.label: Acknowledge the doubt
choices.description: God may be absent, but compassion isn't. Hold to that.

choices.label: Reject faith entirely
choices.description: There is no divine plan. Only choices and consequences.

events.title: Abandoned Security Checkpoint
events.description: A security checkpoint blocks the corridor. The terminal still flickers with power. Access logs show the last entries were made during the catastrophe - desperate requests for evacuation, unanswered.

choices.label: Review the security logs
choices.description: Read through the final moments recorded here.

choices.label: Bypass and continue
choices.description: No point dwelling on the past.

choices.label: Disable security systems
choices.description: Shut down what remains to make passage safer.

events.title: The First Body
events.description: A body lies in the corridor, uniform marking them as facility staff. Their expression is one of pure terror. Whatever killed them left no visible wounds.

choices.label: Examine the body
choices.description: Try to determine cause of death.

choices.label: Pay respects and move on
choices.description: A moment of silence for the fallen.

choices.label: Search their pockets
choices.description: They don't need it anymore.

events.title: Emergency Supply Cache
events.description: A red emergency cabinet hangs open on the wall. Medical supplies and basic equipment are scattered inside, some still sealed.

choices.label: Take everything
choices.description: Load up on supplies while you can.

choices.label: Take only essentials
choices.description: Leave some for others who might need it.

events.title: Personnel Files
events.description: Rows of filing cabinets contain personnel records. Your own files are here, along with those of every other staff member and patient.

choices.label: Read your own file
choices.description: See what they wrote about you.

choices.label: Read Subject 13's file
choices.description: Learn more about the experiment's focal point.

choices.label: Destroy the files
choices.description: Burn the evidence. All of it.

choices.label: Leave them alone
choices.description: The truth can stay buried here.

events.title: Surveillance Room
events.description: Banks of monitors show frozen images from throughout the facility. One screen flickers to life, showing the moment of the catastrophe on loop.

choices.label: Watch the footage
choices.description: Bear witness to what happened.

choices.label: Smash the screens
choices.description: You can't watch this.

choices.label: Salvage equipment
choices.description: Focus on practical concerns.

events.title: Director's Office
events.description: The facility director's office. Everything is pristine except for a half-written letter of resignation on the desk and a revolver with one spent shell.

choices.label: Read the resignation letter
choices.description: See what drove them to this.

choices.label: Take the revolver
choices.description: It might be useful.

choices.label: Leave immediately
choices.description: This place feels cursed.

events.title: Medication Dispensary
events.description: Rows of prescription medications line the walls. Many are experimental drugs with warning labels about severe side effects.

choices.label: Take sedatives
choices.description: Stock up on sanity-restoring medications.

choices.label: Take medical supplies
choices.description: Focus on physical healing.

choices.label: Destroy the drugs
choices.description: These caused so much harm. End it.

events.title: Therapy Recording
events.description: An audio recorder plays a therapy session on loop. A patient describes their nightmares in horrifying detail. The therapist's notes suggest they dismissed it as delusion.

choices.label: Listen to the full recording
choices.description: Honor their experience by bearing witness.

choices.label: Stop the recording
choices.description: It's too painful to hear.

events.title: Isolation Chamber
events.description: A padded cell. Scratch marks cover every surface. Writing is carved into the walls: 'NOT ALONE NOT ALONE NOT ALONE' repeated endlessly.

choices.label: Examine the writing
choices.description: Try to understand what they experienced.

choices.label: Seal the chamber
choices.description: Some places should stay closed.

events.title: Fractured Memory
events.description: You recognize this corridor, but from multiple angles at once. You remember being here - as staff, as patient, as visitor. Which memory is real?

choices.label: Accept all as true
choices.description: Perhaps they all happened.

choices.label: Cling to one memory
choices.description: Pick the version that makes sense.

choices.label: Reject them all
choices.description: These are lies. Hallucinations.

events.title: Chamber of Accusation
events.description: Voices echo from nowhere, listing your failures and sins. They know everything you've done. Everything you've hidden.

choices.label: Confess everything
choices.description: Admit to every accusation.

choices.label: Justify your actions
choices.description: You did what you had to do.

choices.label: Fight the voices
choices.description: Resist the manipulation.

events.title: The Engine's Whispers
events.description: The Engine speaks directly into your mind. It offers absolution. It offers power. It offers oblivion. All you have to do is surrender.

choices.label: Resist the Engine
choices.description: Fight its influence with everything you have.

choices.label: Bargain with the Engine
choices.description: Maybe you can use its power.

choices.label: Accept the Engine's offer
choices.description: Let it all end.

events.title: Subject 13's Vision
events.description: Subject 13 stops suddenly. Their eyes glow faintly. They speak of what's to come - multiple futures, all terrible, all possible.

choices.label: Listen to the prophecy
choices.description: Hear what futures await.

choices.label: Comfort Subject 13
choices.description: Focus on the present, not possible futures.

events.title: Discipline Chamber
events.description: A soundproof room where Elias conducted 'corrective sessions'. Restraints still hang from the walls. Blood stains the floor.

choices.label: Acknowledge what happened here
choices.description: Admit to yourself and others what you did.

choices.label: They needed discipline
choices.description: Order required firm action.

choices.label: Vow to make amends
choices.description: You can't undo this, but you can try to be better.

events.title: Experimental Surgery Logs
events.description: Dr. Kessler's personal research notes. Detailed descriptions of procedures performed without consent. Success rates deliberately falsified.

choices.label: Read every entry
choices.description: Force yourself to witness every failure.

choices.label: Burn the logs
choices.description: Destroy the evidence. No one needs to know.

choices.label: Preserve them for review
choices.description: These failures must be documented. Learned from.

events.title: Subject 13's Containment Cell
events.description: The cell where you were held. Kept. Studied. The walls remember everything - every test, every scream, every moment of clarity and madness.

choices.label: Let the memories flood back
choices.description: Remember it all, even the parts you've blocked out.

choices.label: This wasn't you
choices.description: Whoever was in this cell isn't who you are now.

choices.label: Embrace what you've become
choices.description: The experiments changed you. Accept that.

events.title: Chapel Ruins
events.description: The facility chapel where Anya held services. Now desecrated, symbols scratched out, books burned. Someone wrote 'WHERE WAS GOD?' across the altar.

choices.label: Pray despite everything
choices.description: Hold onto faith in the face of horror.

choices.label: Question everything you believed
choices.description: Maybe they were right. Maybe there is no divine mercy.

choices.label: Seek meaning beyond faith
choices.description: Compassion doesn't need divine mandate.

events.title: Broken Elevator Shaft
events.description: An elevator shaft descends into darkness. Cables dangle loosely. You hear distant sounds from below.

choices.label: Climb down the cables
choices.description: Risky, but might lead somewhere useful.

choices.label: Mark location and continue
choices.description: Too dangerous for now.

events.title: Contaminated Water Source
events.description: A water fountain still functions, but the liquid that flows is tinged an unnatural color. Your throat is parched.

choices.label: Drink the water
choices.description: Risk it. You need hydration.

choices.label: Don't drink
choices.description: Too risky. Find another source.

events.title: Locked Safe
events.description: A heavy safe built into the wall. The combination lock seems intact.

choices.label: Force it open with crowbar
choices.description: Requires a crowbar and effort.

choices.label: Pick the lock
choices.description: Requires lockpicking tools and skill.

choices.label: Leave it locked
choices.description: Come back if you find tools.

events.title: Wall Writings
events.description: Someone has written warnings on the walls in blood: 'TURN BACK', 'IT KNOWS YOUR SINS', 'SUBJECT 13 IS THE KEY'.

choices.label: Study the messages carefully
choices.description: Try to understand what they mean.

choices.label: Ignore the ravings
choices.description: Just paranoid scrawlings.

events.title: Mutated Flora
events.description: Plants have grown through cracks in the facility. They pulse with bioluminescence and seem to move when not observed.

choices.label: Take samples
choices.description: Might have medical applications.

choices.label: Stay away
choices.description: Nothing natural grows like that.

events.title: Director's Final Message
events.description: A recorded message from the facility director: 'If you're hearing this, I've failed. The Engine cannot be stopped. Only destroyed. Subject 13 holds the key. May God forgive us all.'

choices.label: Take the warning seriously
choices.description: Plan to destroy the Engine.

choices.label: Seek to control the Engine instead
choices.description: Maybe you can use its power.

pools.name: Mandatory Story Events
pools.description: Core events that must occur for story progression

pools.name: Optional Side Events
pools.description: Events that add variety and depth to each playthrough
